member.name: ItemDataPosition
member.summary: The ItemDataPosition enumeration is used to specify the location of custom metadata in an image file.

member.name: ItemDataPosition.ItemDataPositionAfterHeader
member.summary: Specifies that custom metadata is stored after the file header. Valid for JPEG, PNG, and GIF.

member.name: ItemDataPosition.ItemDataPositionAfterPalette
member.summary: Specifies that custom metadata is stored after the palette. Valid for PNG.

member.name: ItemDataPosition.ItemDataPositionAfterBits
member.summary: Specifies that custom metadata is stored after the pixel data. Valid for GIF and PNG.
